name: lock_nft_for_bridge
attributes: # [doc = " NFT をブリッジ用にロックするが、"]
# [doc = " bridge_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let bridge = & mut ctx . accounts . bridge_account ;
bridge . destination_chain = ctx . accounts . config . chain_id ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . vault_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

name: release_nft_from_bridge
attributes: # [doc = " ブリッジ完了後にロックを解除し NFT を返却するが、"]
# [doc = " bridge_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let bridge = & mut ctx . accounts . bridge_account ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
